title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman guest hosted for Rush. World without police. Seattle police station overrun by Antifa. Gangs patrol Chicago neighborhoods. NY councilwoman: Angry leftists are hijacking the movement. Republicans want level playing field. Leftist politicians abandon communities. “De-policing” not a fantasy. Caller accuses Democrats of discrimination. The “lived” experience in Northern Idaho. Caller wonders why successful African Americans don’t speak out more. Caller says racism is not a one-way street. Michael Steele’s RNC diversity event.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Democrat contradictions about COVID and protests. Mexico is an example of de-policing. We should be questioning authority. Leftist media conditions society to believe gibberish. Kay C. James, President of The Heritage Foundation, calls in to discuss topics like equality, Democrat failures and Covid-19. The need for human outreach. Caller wants to discuss abortions in African American community. Open season on the police? Caller illuminates the humanity of law enforcement personnel. Seattle government provides portable toilets for leftist agitators.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Media hypes every crisis to control people’s states of mind. Analyzing Spike Lee’s comments about Republicans. Angry NY woman challenges protesters, part 2. Caller says the Left’s use of fear creates trauma similar to domestic abuse cases. Democrats attempt to buy influence through police unions. Caller worries that her African-American children are being racially profiled, despite coming from a happy, two-parent home. Police departments afraid of potential lawsuits. Caller: I’m an Asian American who does not believe in systemic racism. Russia hoax perpetrated by same old bad actors.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
